--- title: "homework6" author: "강남규" date: "2024-07-30" categories: [bigdata] --- **교재 챕터 9-2의 설문조사 그래프에서 각 성별 95% 신뢰구간 계산 후 그리기** # 패키지, 파일 불러오기 ::: {#af20e4c7 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from scipy.stats import norm !pip install pyreadstat raw_welfare = pd.read_spss('../../koweps_hpwc14_2019_beta2.sav') welfare = raw_welfare.copy() welfare = welfare.rename( columns = {'h14_g3' : 'sex', 'h14_g4' : 'birth', 'h14_g10' : 'marriage_type', 'h14_g11' : 'religion', 'p1402_8aq1' : 'income', 'h14_eco9' : 'code_job', 'h14_reg7' : 'code_region'} ) welfare = welfare[['sex', 'birth', 'marriage_type', 'religion', 'income', 'code_job', 'code_region']] welfare ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Defaulting to user installation because normal site-packages is not writeable Requirement already satisfied: pyreadstat in c:\users\user\appdata\roaming\python\python312\site-packages (1.2.7) Requirement already satisfied: pandas>=1.2.0 in c:\users\user\appdata\roaming\python\python312\site-packages (from pyreadstat) (2.2.2) Requirement already satisfied: numpy>=1.26.0 in c:\users\user\appdata\roaming\python\python312\site-packages (from pandas>=1.2.0->pyreadstat) (2.0.1) Requirement already satisfied: python-dateutil>=2.8.2 in c:\users\user\appdata\roaming\python\python312\site-packages (from pandas>=1.2.0->pyreadstat) (2.9.0.post0) Requirement already satisfied: pytz>=2020.1 in c:\users\user\appdata\roaming\python\python312\site-packages (from pandas>=1.2.0->pyreadstat) (2024.1) Requirement already satisfied: tzdata>=2022.7 in c:\users\user\appdata\roaming\python\python312\site-packages (from pandas>=1.2.0->pyreadstat) (2024.1) Requirement already satisfied: six>=1.5 in c:\users\user\appdata\roaming\python\python312\site-packages (from python-dateutil>=2.8.2->pandas>=1.2.0->pyreadstat) (1.16.0) ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
sex birth marriage_type religion income code_job code_region

1 1.0 1948.0 2.0 2.0 NaN NaN 1.0

14413 2.0 1967.0 1.0 1.0 NaN NaN 5.0
14414 2.0 1992.0 5.0 1.0 NaN NaN 5.0
14415 1.0 1995.0 5.0 1.0 NaN 910.0 5.0
14416 2.0 1998.0 5.0 1.0 200.0 246.0 5.0

14418 rows × 7 columns

``` ::: ::: # Q1 **성별에 따른 월급 차이 그래프 그리기** ::: {#e22c3e13 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} welfare['sex'] = np.where(welfare['sex'] == 1, 'male', 'female') sex_income = welfare.dropna(subset = 'income') \ .groupby('sex', as_index = False) \ .agg(income_mean = ('income', 'mean')) sns.barplot(data = sex_income, x = 'sex', y = 'income_mean', hue = 'sex') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](hw6_files/figure-html/cell-3-output-1.png){width=593 height=429} ::: ::: # Q2 **각 성별 신뢰구간 구하기** - 각 성별의 평균과 표준편차 구하기 ::: {#1d667b3e .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} sex_income2 = welfare.dropna(subset = 'income') \ .groupby('sex', as_index = False)[['income']] \ .agg(['mean', 'std']) male_mean = sex_income2.iloc[1, 1] female_mean = sex_income2.iloc[0, 1] male_std = sex_income2.iloc[1, 2] female_std = sex_income2.iloc[0, 2] print('남성의 월급 평균은 ' + str(sex_income2.iloc[1, 1].round(2)) + '입니다.') print('여성의 월급 평균은 ' + str(sex_income2.iloc[0, 1].round(2)) + '입니다.') print('남성의 월급 표준편차는 ' + str(sex_income2.iloc[1, 2].round(2)) + '입니다.') print('여성의 월급 표준편차는 ' + str(sex_income2.iloc[0, 2].round(2)) + '입니다.') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 남성의 월급 평균은 349.04입니다. 여성의 월급 평균은 186.29입니다. 남성의 월급 표준편차는 217.86입니다. 여성의 월급 표준편차는 132.06입니다. ``` ::: ::: # Q3 - Z(0.025)와 Z(0.975)구하기 ::: {#b9fe108a .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} print('Z_0.025는 ' + str(norm.ppf(0.025,0,1).round(2)) + '입니다.') print('Z_0.975는 ' + str(norm.ppf(0.975,0,1).round(2)) + '입니다.') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Z_0.025는 -1.96입니다. Z_0.975는 1.96입니다. ``` ::: ::: # Q4 **95% 신뢰구간 구하기** - 남성: X~N(349.04, 217.86^2) - 여성: X~N(186.29, 132.06^2) - 신뢰구간은 X_bar +- Z_alpha0.025 * sigma / sqrt(n) ::: {#23203a19 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} only_income = welfare.dropna(subset = 'income') male_count = len(only_income.query('sex == "male"')) female_count = len(only_income.query('sex == "female"')) print('남성의 수는 ' + str(len(only_income.query('sex == "male"'))) + '입니다.') print('여성의 수는 ' + str(len(only_income.query('sex == "female"'))) + '입니다.') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 남성의 수는 2289입니다. 여성의 수는 2245입니다. ``` ::: ::: ::: {#4560a0e2 .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} male_025 = male_mean - 1.96 * male_std / np.sqrt(male_count) male_975 = male_mean + 1.96 * male_std / np.sqrt(male_count) female_025 = female_mean - 1.96 * female_std / np.sqrt(female_count) female_975 = female_mean + 1.96 * female_std / np.sqrt(female_count) print('남성의 신뢰구간은 ' + str(male_025.round(2)) + '에서 ' + str(male_975.round(2)) + '까지입니다.') print('여성의 신뢰구간은 ' + str(female_025.round(2)) + '에서 ' + str(female_975.round(2)) + '까지입니다.') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 남성의 신뢰구간은 340.11에서 357.96까지입니다. 여성의 신뢰구간은 180.83에서 191.76까지입니다. ``` ::: ::: # Q4 **그래프 그리기** ::: {#e90d5f5b .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.barplot(data = sex_income, x = 'sex', y = 'income_mean', hue = 'sex') plt.plot([0, 0], [female_025, female_975], color='r') plt.plot([1, 1], [male_025, male_975], color='r') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](hw6_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-1.png){width=593 height=429} ::: :::
